function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Uncontrolled spread of infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in implementation of interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assumptions leading to underestimation of risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unmitigated epidemic with predicted deaths","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exceeding critical care bed capacity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High peak demand on critical care beds beyond surge capacity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relatively little impact of stopping mass gatherings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of control measures without overwhelming healthcare systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in initiating social distancing and closure of schools and universities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the reproduction number r0 and severity of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prolonged implementation of social distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Population-wide social distancing measures may be socially disruptive and challenging to implement.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relaxation of social distancing measures may lead to a resurgence of transmission and new waves of infection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of home isolation and school closures may lead to continued transmission within households and educational institutions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large stocks of vaccine not available for 18 months or more","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large uncertainties around transmission of the virus and policy effectiveness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spontaneous adoption of risk-reducing behaviors uncertain","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evolution of measures for suppression may lead to decreased efficiency of containment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns regarding mobile phone tracking apps may hinder policy effectiveness","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to sustain intensive npi packages for suppression may lead to rapid transmission rebound","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of ineffective epidemic suppression due to school and university closures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Timing of interventions for mitigation and suppression strategies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in seeing the impact of interventions on hospitalised case numbers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective mitigation strategies may lead to overwhelming the healthcare system capacity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social and economic effects of epidemic suppression measures will be profound","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty of long-term success of epidemic suppression strategy","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assuming that each intervention has the same effect on the reproduction number across countries and over time.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on data from countries with more advanced epidemics and earlier interventions, such as italy and spain.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High level of uncertainty in estimating the effective reproduction number, rt, in italy around the time of lockdown.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wide credible interval estimates for the reproduction number","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large epidemics of covid-19 in europe","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-pharmaceutical interventions vary between countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High 𝑅 𝑡 leading to uncontrolled epidemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of control measures leading to virus spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited testing capacity leading to biased view of infection trends.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on reported deaths for estimating infection rates.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strong assumption of intervention efficacy across different countries.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited testing capacity leading to underestimation of true infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Timing of interventions and speed of implementation varying among countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data on the impact of interventions and uncertainty in model estimates","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher proportion of the population infected in spain 15.0%","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in initial reproduction numbers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large changes in rt in response to non-pharmaceutical interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in reproduction numbers rt across countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to conclude whether interventions are sufficient to drive rt below 1","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimating intervention impact","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistical impossibility of determining the greatest effect of interventions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability of the model without interventions to capture recent trends in deaths","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High level of under-ascertainment of infections due to focus on testing in hospital settings rather than in the community.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low percentage of individuals infected, with an attack rate on average of 4.9%.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
